nml_option.name: config_AM_mocStreamfunction_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member MOC streamfunction is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_mocStreamfunction_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_mocStreamfunction_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the mocStreamfunction analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_mocStreamfunction_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_mocStreamfunction_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_mocStreamfunction_min_bin
nml_option.description: minimum bin boundary value. If set to -1.0e34, the minimum value in the domain is found.

nml_option.name: config_AM_mocStreamfunction_max_bin
nml_option.description: maximum bin boundary value. If set to -1.0e34, the maximum value in the domain is found.

nml_option.name: config_AM_mocStreamfunction_num_bins
nml_option.description: Number of bins in South-to-North direction used for moc streamfunction calculation.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer value less than or equal to nMocStreamfunctionBins.

nml_option.name: config_AM_mocStreamfunction_vertical_velocity_value
nml_option.description: The vertical velocity variable used for the computation of the MOC Streamfunction.
nml_option.possible_values: Either of 'vertVelocityTop', 'vertTransportVelocityTop' or 'vertGMBolusVelocityTop' (all from diagnostics pool).

nml_option.name: config_AM_mocStreamfunction_normal_velocity_value
nml_option.description: The normal velocity variable used for the computation of the MOC Streamfunction.
nml_option.possible_values: Either of 'vertVelocityTop', 'vertTransportVelocityTop' or 'vertGMBolusVelocityTop' (all from diagnostics pool).

nml_option.name: config_AM_mocStreamfunction_region_group
nml_option.description: The name of the region group, for which the moc should be computed in addition to the global MOC.
nml_option.possible_values: Either of '', 'all' or any valid region group name.

nml_option.name: config_AM_mocStreamfunction_transect_group
nml_option.description: The name of the transect group that holds the boundaries for the regions in the region group, configured in 'config_AM_mocStreamfunction_region_group'. Please note, that these two should have the same amount of entries.

dim.name: nMocStreamfunctionBins
dim.description: Maximum number of bins in South-to-North direction for moc streamfunction.

dim.name: nMocStreamfunctionBinsP1
dim.description: Maximum number of Lat bins for moc streamfunction, plus one.

package.name: mocStreamfunctionAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the mocStreamfunction analysis member.

var.name: mocStreamvalLatAndDepth
var.description: The value of the MOC streamfunction for each latitude-bin (first dimension) and depth (second dimension)

var.name: mocStreamvalLatAndDepthRegion
var.description: The value of the MOC streamfunction for each latitude-bin (first dimension) and depth (second dimension)

var.name: binBoundaryMocStreamfunction
var.description: Coordinate of southern edge of meridional heat transport bin, either in latitude or y, for plotting.

var.name: minMaxLatRegion
var.description: Coordinates of the southern and northern boundaries of each region (for drawing).
